title: Flipped Learning-Based Research Skills Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental academic paper reading comprehension skills and basic understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: A language domain research skills development course in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, emphasizing practical competencies applicable to real-world research projects for professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate competency in designing research questions and critical analysis in flipped classroom settings.
Learners apply the entire research process—from topic selection to result interpretation—through PBL projects.
Learners can draft research papers through peer feedback and expert reviews.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
